parameters.name: Timeframe
parameters.description: Set the global time range for all queries below

parameters.name: _severity
parameters.description: parameter to drill down on clicked severity tile
parameters.label: severity

content.query:
datatable (Count: long, status: string, status_count: long) [0, "Compliance", 1, 0, "Informational", 2, 0, "Suspicious", 3, 0, "Critical", 4]
| union
    (
    DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
    | where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
    | extend status = case(    
        compliance == false and category == "Critical", "Critical",
        compliance == true, "Compliance",
        compliance == false and category == "Suspicious", "Suspicious",
        compliance == false and category == "Informational", "Informational",       
        "True"
        )
    | where status != "True"
    | extend status_count = case(status == "Critical", 4, status == "Suspicious", 3, status == "Informational", 2, 1)
    | summarize Count = count() by status, status_count
    )
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by status, status_count
| sort by status_count asc
content.title: Model Alerts by Category

content.json: _Click on the tiles to view more details (maximum 100 entries displayed)_

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| where compliance == true
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, score, modelName, description, deviceLabel, deviceCredentials, sourceIp, destIp, threatId, alertUrl 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Compliance Model Alerts

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| where compliance == false and category == "Informational"
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, score, modelName, description, deviceLabel, deviceCredentials, sourceIp, destIp, threatId, alertUrl 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Informational Model Alerts

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| where compliance == false and category == "Suspicious"
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, score, modelName, description, deviceLabel, deviceCredentials, sourceIp, destIp, threatId, alertUrl 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Suspicious Model Alerts

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| where compliance == false and category == "Critical"
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, score, modelName, description, deviceLabel, deviceCredentials, sourceIp, destIp, threatId, alertUrl 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Critical Model Alerts

items.name: Drill down group for different severities

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| make-series Count = count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range({Timeframe:start}, now(), {Timeframe:grain})
content.title: Visualizing Threat Patterns: Model Alerts

content.json: _ Selecting a timeframe on the graph will change the timeframe for all queries below _

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| summarize event_count=count() by modelName
| top 10 by event_count
content.title: Top 10 Most Alerted Models

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| where isnotempty(destHost) 
| summarize count(modelName) by destHost
content.title: Top External Hostnames

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| project TimeGenerated, score, modelName, description, deviceLabel, deviceCredentials, sourceIp, destIp, threatId, alertUrl 
| top 10 by score desc
content.title: Top 10 Model Alerts with Highest Score

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS")
| where isnotempty(destIp) 
| where destIp !startswith "10" and destIp !startswith "192" and destIp !startswith "172"
| summarize event_count=count() by destIp
| top 10 by event_count
content.title: Top 10 External IPs

content.query:
DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
| where modelName !contains ("SaaS") and modelName !contains ("IaaS") and compliance == true
| make-series Count = count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range({Timeframe:start}, now(), {Timeframe:grain})
content.title: Compliance Model Alerts Over Time

content.query:
datatable (Count: long, status: string, status_count: long) [0, "Compliance", 1, 0, "Informational", 2, 0, "Suspicious", 3, 0, "Critical", 4]
| union
    (
    DarktraceModelAlerts_CL
    | where modelName contains ("SaaS") or modelName contains ("IaaS")
    | extend status = case(    
        compliance == false and category == "Critical", "Critical",
        compliance == true, "Compliance",

    | where status != "True"

DarktraceResponseActions_CL
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, deviceHostname, deviceIp, deviceLabel, deviceType, model, reason, score, state, url
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

parameters.name: aia_type
parameters.label: Darktrace Incident Types
parameters.description: Filter out the types of AI Analyst Incidents available.
parameters.value: DarktraceIncidents_CL | project TimeGenerated, aiaScore, bestAssetName, currentGroup, groupPreviousGroups, incidentEventTitle

content.query: {aia_type}
content.title: All Darktrace Incident Events

content.json: _ Selecting a Darktrace Incident Event in the table above will group all the related Darktrace Incident Events below within the set timeframe _

content.query:
let relatedGroups =
    DarktraceIncidents_CL
    | where groupPreviousGroups has "{SelectedAIAGroup}" or "{SelectedAIAGroup}" == currentGroup
    | extend allGroups = array_concat(groupPreviousGroups, pack_array(currentGroup))
    | mv-expand group = allGroups
    | project groupStr = tostring(group)
    | summarize by groupStr;
DarktraceIncidents_CL
| where currentGroup in (relatedGroups)
content.title: Darktrace Incident

content.query:
DarktraceIncidents_CL
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated in range({Timeframe:start}, now(), {Timeframe:grain})
content.title: Visualizing Threat Patterns: Darktrace Incident Events

content.json: _ Selecting a timeframe on the graph will change the timeframe for queries below _

content.query:
DarktraceIncidents_CL
| summarize event_count=count() by incidentEventTitle
| top 10 by event_count
content.title: Most Frequent Darktrace Incident Events

content.query:
DarktraceEMAIL_CL
| extend Actions = parse_json(actions)
| extend Hold_Email=set_has_element(Actions, "Hold")
| extend Junk_Email=set_has_element(Actions, "Move to Junk")
| extend Lock_Link=set_has_element(Actions, "Lock Link")
| extend Lock_All_Links=set_has_element(Actions, "Lock All Links")
| extend Double_Lock_Link=set_has_element(Actions, "Double Lock Link")
| extend Double_Lock_All_Links=set_has_element(Actions, "Double Lock All Links")
| extend Strip_Attachment=set_has_element(Actions, "Stip Attachment")
| extend Strip_All_Attachments=set_has_element(Actions, "Strip All Attachments")
| extend Convert_Attachment=set_has_element(Actions, "Convert Attachment")
| extend Convert_All_Attachments=set_has_element(Actions, "Convert All Attachments")
| extend Unspoof=set_has_element(Actions, "Unspoof")
| extend XAxis=set_has_element(Actions, "Unspoof")
| summarize XAxis=countif(XAxis == true), Hold_Email=countif(Hold_Email == true), Junk_Email=countif(Junk_Email == true), Lock_Link=countif(Lock_Link == true), Lock_All_Links=countif(Lock_All_Links == true), Double_Lock_Link=countif(Double_Lock_Link == true), Double_Lock_All_Links=countif(Double_Lock_All_Links == true), Convert_Attachment=countif(Convert_Attachment == true), Convert_All_Attachments=countif(Convert_All_Attachments == true), Strip_Attachment=countif(Strip_Attachment == true), Strip_All_Attachments=countif(Strip_All_Attachments == true), Unspoof=countif(Unspoof == true)
content.title: Total Actions Taken

content.query:
DarktraceEMAIL_CL
| extend Actions = parse_json(actions)
| extend Hold_Email=set_has_element(Actions, "Hold")
| where Hold_Email == true 
| extend recipients=parse_json(recipients)
| where recipients contains "{SearchRecipient}"
| project subject, from, recipients, anomalyScore, timestamp, direction, tags, attachmentNames, url, uuid
content.title: Held Emails

content.query:
DarktraceEMAIL_CL
| where direction == "inbound"
| project-rename Sender=from
| summarize Count=count() by Sender
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Most Frequent External Senders

parameters.name: _severity
parameters.label: severity
parameters.description: parameter to drill down on clicked severity tile

content.query:
datatable (Count: long, status: string, status_count: long) [0, "Low", 1, 0, "Medium", 2, 0, "High", 3, 0, "Critical", 4]
| union
    (
    DarktraceSystemStatusAlerts_CL
    | extend status = case(    
        priority == "low", "Low",
        priority == "medium", "Medium",
        priority == "high", "High",
        priority == "critical", "Critical",          
        "True"
        )
    | where status != "True"
    | extend status_count = case(status == "Critical", 4, status == "High", 3, status == "Medium", 2, 1)
    | summarize Count = count() by status, status_count
    )
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by status, status_count
| sort by status_count asc
content.title: System Status Alerts by Priority

content.json: _Click on the tiles to view more details (maximum 100 entries displayed)_

content.query:
DarktraceSystemStatusAlerts_CL
| where priority == "low"
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, customLabel, darktraceHostname, deviceIp, friendlyModelName, message, modelName, priority, priorityCode, severity, status, statusName, url, uuid
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Low Priority System Status Alerts

content.query:
DarktraceSystemStatusAlerts_CL
| where priority == "medium"
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, customLabel, darktraceHostname, deviceIp, friendlyModelName, message, modelName, priority, priorityCode, severity, status, statusName, url, uuid
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Medium Priority System Status Alerts

content.query:
DarktraceSystemStatusAlerts_CL
| where priority == "high"
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, customLabel, darktraceHostname, deviceIp, friendlyModelName, message, modelName, priority, priorityCode, severity, status, statusName, url, uuid
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: High Priority System Status Alerts

content.query:
DarktraceSystemStatusAlerts_CL
| where priority == "critical"
| limit 100
| project TimeGenerated, customLabel, darktraceHostname, deviceIp, friendlyModelName, message, modelName, priority, priorityCode, severity, status, statusName, url, uuid
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Critical Priority System Status Alerts

items.name: Drill down group for different severities
